storyInfo: Alanna contends with the truckjacker and cajoles her into bringing the truck to a checkpoint to call for help, but security officers want to board the truck to check for Infected. She pleads in vain in to protect Warmy, and ends up charging through the checkpoint gates with the truckjacker's help.

attributes.text: A long and narrow strip of dust rises up from the sand, burying any tracks we've left. A scene I've seen too many times to count.
They call me 'Alanna of the Barrenlands', but I'm defo no unstoppable sandstorm. Just a tumbleweed that stops and goes.
My bets with the workers are a stage for me to perform on, and my passengers' adventures are just more bragging fodder for me.
But... are those really my stories to tell?
The lone vehicle sails across the land, over the ashen-yellow desert sand, and under the dazzling golden sun.
It deviates from its usual path.
What is it looking for? What is it running from?
Well... what am I looking for? What am I running from?

attributes.content: Weather's pretty good. You can even see the Originium clusters in the distance. Reckon we'll reach our destination without a hitch.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Quiet again. Nothing you wanna say?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I've never met a passenger as boring as you in all my time as a driver.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: What did you say?
Ah, never mind... Hey, d-d-don't—keep that thing down, why don't you?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: What are you doing?
I just wanted to open the window for some fresh air! That's all, promise!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright.
Can you uh, get your big buddy away from my head first? We can talk this through.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Continue towards the Grinning Valley, and I won't hurt you.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Telling me that after hijacking my ute and pointing this toy cannon at my face? What's even in that thing?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Custom bolts. Infected creatures are afraid of them.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: I was hoping you'd say 'carrots' or 'lollies' instead.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Well, no worries. I'm no Infected creature, so I probably shouldn't find it too scary.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But if you insist on keeping it pointed at my head—
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: If you pull the trigger, big IF here—if I croak, what's going to happen to the truck?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I can drive it.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Can you now? It's gonna spin out of control by the time you get your mauley on the lever.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: It'll charge straight into a cliff, or crash into one of those Originium clusters. And then—
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: BOOM!!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Fine. Even if you can drive, and the truck doesn't go topsy-turvy...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Kill me if you want, but what about the other passengers? They...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Or that guy—what about that Zalak?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I gave everyone the chance to hop off, but no one took it.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: I just need the vehicle.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Don't you find it strange? Why he didn't leave?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I'd be worried, if I were you.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: A hit-and-run tearaway, an unlucky fella fed up with his job...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Or maybe, he's an undercover copper on your trail? Don't let all that trembling and shaking fool you, he might be hiding some real skills under his sleeve!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Everyone's hiding a secret or two, yeah? Nah?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: ...Hmm.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: And if you're wondering why I'm still here? As a company girl, I have to keep their property safe.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: This ute's been with me for an awful long time, so emotion or logic-wise, I can't just give her up to a rando blow in.
attributes.name: Alanna
Alanna
attributes.content: This should've been its...

attributes.name: Alanna
attributes.content: Right, it's on its way to be reborn!

attributes.name: Alanna
attributes.content: It should've gone for Iron Carrot City, where millions of ore chunks go every day. The passengers would salute it when it enter the motor pool.
attributes.joined: This should've been its... Right, it's on its way to be reborn!It should've gone for Iron Carrot City, where millions of ore chunks go every day. The passengers would salute it when it enter the motor pool.

attributes.name: Alanna
attributes.content: There, it'd be remodeled into a newer, cooler version. Install a tunnel boring module, for example. So it can head straight underground the next time a Catastrophe warning sounds.
attributes.joined: There, it'd be remodeled into a newer, cooler version. Install a tunnel boring module, for example. So it can head straight underground the next time a Catastrophe warning sounds.

attributes.name: Alanna
attributes.content: Hah, I gotta thank you on behalf of my ute! The new life we were about to find in Carrot's is all gone! Couldn't have done it without ya, mate!
attributes.joined: Hah, I gotta thank you on behalf of my ute! The new life we were about to find in Carrot's is all gone! Couldn't have done it without ya, mate!

attributes.content: You talk so much, and so fast. Real bonzer.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: A new life? What's that about...
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Isn't life the same everywhere...? There's nothing new or old to it, or different.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Fine, maybe you're right.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Y'know, even having my head suddenly up against some stranger's weapon isn't anything new to me.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Maybe that's something to be sad about.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The truckjacker slowly lowers the giant crossbow.
Why'd you respond to that, of all things...? Whatever, I guess you do have some humanity in there.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Though, even if you want this for your own free charter, you've gotta be a bit more polite.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: That's how you'll make us, the people you've dragged into this, happier to cooperate with you.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I didn't want to involve anyone else.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: I asked around, and there shouldn't have been any passengers this time.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: I get it. You've been planning this for a while, huh.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But you're bound to have a surprise or two, even if your crime's nice and premeditated.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Fine, let's just say my beat-up ute and I hit the jackpot.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: When we get there, everyone's free to go.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: I'll pay you too.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Wow-wee. Sure hope so.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Then, for your 'private charter', we'll first go to the Grinning Valley—but you have to make sure everyone here's safe, and enough raising your crossbow willy-nilly.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Good then, jacker—just sit tight and enjoy the view on the way to your stop!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: At some point in time, the truck gradually begins to slow down before coming to a halt.
It enters a checkpoint, joining the other vehicles waiting to clear, one after the other. The truck inches forward, bit by bit, every time the other trucks go through the gates.
Alanna used to hate this part, but now she wants the traffic jam to go on for as long as possible.
Because this way, she can be even more certain that she'll get her off-course truck back.
Crowded.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Hah, probably just another international entrepreneur clearing the raw materials out of the nearby mines. They must be working overtime to deliver the goods.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: They spill money like water, and make us road warriors suffer.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Why not go another way? This road is so congested.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: We have to go through Green Meadow if we want to get to the Grinning Valley. No choice.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But they don't really check much. Just collect the toll and register a name.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: (The truck behind needs to hurry up. Good, that's it, now we've got no way out.)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The truckjacker leaves her seat, walking down the narrow corridor as if to confirm the conditions outside, and returns after a moment.
On her way back, the sound of her footsteps sends Alanna's heartbeat racing.
Alanna can only see the truckjacker's hand gripping her crossbow through the rearview mirror.
The figure draped in olive shades covers all the junk reflected in the mirror before appearing in her peripheral vision and sitting next to Alanna once more.
Her expression and body language show a sense of calm. The subtle noise of her clothes brushing the leather seat happens to bury Alanna's thumping heartbeats.
What's up?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: (Seems she's not onto me. Phew.)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (Hmm... There's no way this is the only route to the Grinning Valley. This road is the shortest one, but you have to go through inspections.)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (I'll get a chance to call for help as long as I can talk to the inspector. I reckon she and her crossbow won't match up to the well-trained security stationed here.)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Looks like a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: These vehicles all seem to be avoiding a Catastrophe... or maybe some other bad thing.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Why's that? How do you figure?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The scratches on their exteriors are from infected creatures. And there's some dust... it's just a little, but I can see the particles.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: And the expressions of the people inside the cars too.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: The mine workers tend to have similar looks on their faces after an accident...
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: The same kind of impatience and unease when they don't know where to go.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Hold up.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I'll go ask.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Hey, bruv! Old bloke in the slag truck.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: What's with the road being chockas today?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You didn't come from Double Helmet Mine, did you?
attributes.name: Tired Driver

attributes.content: Nah, mate. Rustdreg Town.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Double Helmet... I remember a group of guys raving about mining some new place with a ton of minerals a while back—
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: There was an accident.
attributes.name: Tired Driver

attributes.content: Some unstable Originium blew the mine inside-out, and now no one can stay there anymore...
attributes.name: Tired Driver

attributes.content: Ah... bloody hell.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: So you escaped? How're the others doing?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The driver suddenly coughs violently, and Alanna notices his face is unusually pale.
*cough* Them, well... they'll have to count on their own luck... I just hope my wife and kid are lucky enough.
attributes.name: Tired Driver

attributes.content: Most of the vehicles here are probably the same as me, no home to return to. We can only stay elsewhere until they finish cleaning up the site.
attributes.name: Tired Driver

attributes.content: Alanna turns back for a look.
The truckjacker is gazing out the side window with a calm look on her face.
What's wrong?
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: ...Nothing.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: They're coming.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The grabbers. They're gonna board the truck.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Who? Not a soul in sight headed our way.
Alanna follows the truckjacker's line of sight and finally realizes what she was referring to.
A group of security officers at the checkpoint are chatting with the driver in front, while another group enters the vehicle with protective gear and violent intent.
Soon after, they drag the driver out of the car. His sleeves are cut open, with blood flowing from the exposed Originium crystals on his arms.
Alanna suddenly feels inexplicably uneasy—
They're searching.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: For Infected.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: In the truck's tiny tool room, little Potlid is keeping her word.
...Hmm.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: That Cautus hijacker lady is so weird.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: But she and Lanns are looking pretty chummy... Did she really hijack the truck...? Oh! I get it! Lanns is so powerful, she can turn anyone into a friend!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Look! The monitor on the little terminal—
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Seems like... she doesn't want to hurt anyone.
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Th-Then, are we going back to our route? Can we postpone the truck's retirement?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Huh—?!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Just out of the blue here, but... why are you in here with me too, Mister?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: This is a secret room, closed to the public!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Um... well... I got a little scared... no, not a little, I'm REALLY scared... this is my first hijacking...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: I just hurried to the first door I saw...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Can you let me stay here, kiddo? Look, I'll squeeze myself into this corner and won't take up too much space, and I won't disturb your work either...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Huh? Okay, sure! But...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: If you're scared, then why didn't you get off the truck before?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: I... don't know why myself... Scared is one thing, but deep inside... I also felt a sudden relief.
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Um... Like I might run into something even scarier if I got off the truck... I also want this truck to go as far and as long as it can—
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Why didn't you get off?
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Me? Why would I?! Lanns is still here, so there's no way I could leave her on her own!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: 'Lanns'... You're referring to the truck driver, right? Are you two family? Or...?
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Family? Uh... I dunno, I left home so long ago.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Lanns is a little like Daddy, and also Mummy, and the miners too... If she's like everyone, then it also means she isn't like any of them at all either, right?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Lanns is Lanns. She made a bet with her friends, and I'm their chip...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: So... we can't be family, right? We just live together, we've always been living together on this truck.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: The exit is right before her eyes, but the gates lie shut, blocking the vehicle.
A few security officers walk to the cab and knock on the window.
Alanna hesitates for a moment, but gets out of the truck anyway.
What's up, mate?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Routine inspection.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: Do you have to inspect public transport vehicles too?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Look, here's my operating license.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Special circumstances. Please cooperate.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: Nah, that can't be right. There were so many trucks in front just now, but you let them all go through. Now you stop us when it's my turn?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Crikey. Bloody luck's off the charts today, what with all these 'nice things' happening to me!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (Whispering) Sir, don't bother with her... I just checked the vehicle's identification number, and they came from Big Pillar!
attributes.name: Inspector B

attributes.content: (Whispering) You know, they've got tons of messily managed mines over there, and they don't standardize safety procedures either. Lots of Infected!
attributes.name: Inspector B

attributes.content: Your vehicle ID isn't from Green Meadow, and we inspect all vehicles from out of town.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: And what if I refuse?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Then our well-equipped security will 'politely' ask you out of your truck for a more in-depth investigation at our office.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: We might lock you up for a few days, or months, confiscate your vehicle, revoke your license, and hit you with a nasty fine.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: The specific steps we'll take will depend on how long you decide to keep messing with me.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: Mate, ain't this a bit much? I've been driving for years and passed a lot of checkpoints, but this is a first...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The security officers raise their crossbows at Alanna.
...Fine.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Only the driver has to cooperate with the inspection, yeah? Everybody else here is passengers...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Passengers?
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: Yeah, they're all...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: At this point, Alanna turns back, looking toward the passenger cabin's open door and the situation within.
(Potlid's hiding good.)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (But... what about that Zalak?)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (And the jacker... wait, why is she loading her crossbow?!)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: She... she's a passenger, bought a ticket.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But the equipment you've got on hand looks like it's out of regs? All the checkpoints I've been through, this is the first time I've seen anyone checking infection status.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: If the passenger isn't willing to get checked, you'll put me in a spot of trouble. If she complains to the operating company—
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: 'Nuff with your guff.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: We're coming aboard.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: The party of passengers sit next to one another with an Oripathy screening device each on their hands.
Alanna is more worried about the others than herself—
Potlid dips her head down, staring blankly at the device's progress bar.
The truckjacker looks at the security officer sitting across from her, through the open door, and at every corner of the checkpoint.
The Zalak who was unwilling to get off the truck earlier is seated a short distance away from her... his legs shaking.
Now what's with these two in a hidden compartment? Did you know they were on board?
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: ...Of course I did.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: And you deliberately hid them from us?
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: That's... you lot gave me such a fright with your fierce mugs, I forgot to mention them.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Haha, I'm sure we can talk this out...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: —Whose device was that?!
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: (I... What should I do? What... what will Lanns do?)
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: A single bead of sweat trickles down Alanna's cheek.
The security officers do not look the least bit accommodating as they surround them. Looks like things are about to get tougher.
She needs to figure out a solution to this predicament, and quick, or else...
Well... Sir, dear sir...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: This passenger here, she's just a little kid. She's come here to Green Meadow... to your prefecture to look for her dad.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I hear her father works in a smelting plant and it's been about a year since he's been home... The walls and gates at this checkpoint, and even the materials used in these testing devices might be the fruits of his labor.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: This tiny Cautus... She only gets one ride every two, maybe three months, just to see her hardworking father.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: She's a regular rider on our truck, and this has never happened before, everyone usually just breezes right through here.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: With all due respect, sir, would you make things difficult for such a poor little girl who misses her daddy so very much?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: There's been a flood of evacuees here from the Double Helmet Mine disaster.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: Our superiors expect us to tamp down the influx of Infected here, so this is not about making things difficult. We're just doing our job.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: (Waves hand) Get moving.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: I saw it last night, Alanna. Clear as day.
attributes.name: Charlie the Sproglet

attributes.content: That kid you've kept hiding in your truck for the last two years... she's Infected. No wonder you never bring her to see us!
attributes.name: Charlie the Sproglet

attributes.content: You bloody clown. Going all the way just for a dumb bet.
attributes.name: Charlie the Sproglet

attributes.content: Your damned stubborn competitiveness and bottomless pride...
attributes.name: Charlie the Sproglet

attributes.content: I always said you'd drag yourself into trouble like that, taking some others down with you.
attributes.name: Charlie the Sproglet

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Uh... Mister Inspector, Sir, we'll head right out of here, straight back where we came from! Right away!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: What d'ya say?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The checkpoint's our jurisdiction too, so you still have to comply with us, even if you don't intend to cross.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: Sir... I'll pay the toll here, or even an additional fine, or...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Or just impound the ute and even drag me away, I'll cooperate with your investigation...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I'm begging you, just... let the kid go... please?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Potlid has never seen Alanna with such an expression.
In their time together, Alanna has always been brave, fearless, and one might even say anarchic.
She makes funny faces, blows up her past experiences, and explodes into laughter without a care for her own image—
But now she's pleading with the officers in such an unbecoming way... for Potlid's sake.
Take her away.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: Lanns...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: ...It's okay.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Don't...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You don't have to see me off, I'm just stepping out for a second. I'll come find you in a bit, Lanns.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Any other Infected?
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: This one too!
attributes.name: Inspector B

attributes.content: Then she goes too.
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: ...Where is she?
attributes.name: Inspector A

attributes.content: A crossbow bolt flies out, interrupting the security officers preparing to board and inspect the vehicle.
A flurry of additional bolts follows up, forcing them to retreat.

attributes.name: Inspector A
attributes.content: Wh—

attributes.name: Inspector A
attributes.content: The purple-haired woman! Get her!
Yes sir!
attributes.name: Security Officer

attributes.content: A punch, a kick, a crossbow slam. A few officers knocked down with grimaces on their faces.
Another volley of bolts rips through their clothes and pins them to the ground.
The truckjacker steps over the messy pile of limbs until she reaches Potlid.
Let's go.
attributes.name: Truckjacker
Potlid
attributes.content: Wha?

attributes.name: Potlid
attributes.content: ...Alrighty!
W—Wait! You haven't—
attributes.name: Inspector A
Inspector A
attributes.content: Haven't—

attributes.name: Inspector A
attributes.content: No, nothing...
Get the ute started.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: What's the matter...?
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: ...*cough* Back in the truck! Let's go!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: (Glad I didn't turn her in.)
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Right, what about you?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Your device didn't beep, did it? Why did you hop off?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I... I'm a little scared...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: So... uh, wherever you lot go, I'll, follow...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: You're not going anywhere!
attributes.name: Fallen Security Officer

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: The officer grabs the Zalak's calf, causing him to nearly trip, and he stomps on the officer's hand while balancing himself.
AGH!!! My fingers—
attributes.name: Fallen Security Officer

attributes.content: S-SORRY!! I'm really sorry... I, we... we'll be going now!
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: We're surrounded.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Probably backup... Strewth, shit's escalating real fast.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: What do we do now?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I counted more than forty of them, the whole squad's armed with anti-armor.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: And a thick steel gate in front of us.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: I have no good ideas.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Ideas... Hmm... ideas... Actually, I got a good one.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: It's super risky, but I'll brag about it for years if we succeed.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: I gotta say, jacker.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: This ute of mine ain't no regular truck.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Wanna know its full name?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: It's called—Earthrock-excavating bottletree-transplanting crew-carrying intercity transporter.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Excavating and bottletrees aside, you know the two steel beams at the Rustdreg Town entrance? This beauty propped them up.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: And of course, you're looking at the very driver responsible.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Lanns...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Your hands are shaking.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Shut it! Sit down tight—
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: We're going in!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Can I just... Is there anything we can use to patch up these holes?
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: I'm feeling... a little chilly.
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Several holes dot the vehicle's exterior, funneling the wild winds from outside and messing up the Zalak's hair.
Nowt we can do. Just bear with it.
attributes.name: Alanna
Alanna
attributes.content: I'll look for a mobile platform to get some repair materials later...

attributes.name: Alanna
attributes.content: ...Wait, why're you still here?
attributes.joined: I'll look for a mobile platform to get some repair materials later......Wait, why're you still here?

attributes.content: Who even are you?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Ah, I... uh... I'm just an ordinary passenger...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: I'm a good guy! Really! Look, here's my ID...
attributes.name: Jittery Passenger

attributes.content: Jerry, huh... But I'm afraid we don't have any use for good Jerrys right now.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Don't worry about me! I won't tell a soul what happened back there!
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Well, it is what it is.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Everyone here's an accomplice now, so no one's getting away.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Got that, jacker? We're ALL jackers now.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Also, thanks for that. Thanks a lot for saving Potlid.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: My device went off too.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: They would have sent us to the Infected treatment zone if they took us away.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: But I still need to get to the Grinning Valley.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Alright, alright. We're off to the Grinning Valley now, the truck's final destination!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But we might not have enough fuel for our trip, so we'd better find a mobile platform to resupply, and find a way to patch up my battered ute while we're at it.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Otherwise, it'll be tough to explain to the company when I hand her back.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Right. So what's your name?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: The miners all call me Ray.
attributes.name: Truckjacker

attributes.content: Alrighty, Ray. Still feel like 'jacker' rolls off the tongue easier though.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Say, jacker. You got me a bit curious... you hijacked this ute and beat up those officers without a care... what in Terra's name are you after in the Grinning Valley?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: That place isn't exactly car friendly, and I hear it's basically just wasteland ruins after Catastrophes wrecked it... Or do you mean, there might be some treasure to find there?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Out with it, mate! It'll be worth all that noise if there's something good in store for us!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I'm looking for a huge shadow.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: ...A what?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: A shadow as tall as a mountain, shooting rays of light through the fog.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: It can talk too.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: ...It... can talk?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Wha?! What kind of bloody creature is that?!
attributes.name: Alanna
